=== Summary ===
Hello folks, I lived in Beijing, China. I started to use Linux since 1999 year, and my first distribution was Redhat 5.0, I use Ubuntu since 2005. and I felt in Love with it when I first looked at Breezy (5.10), So now, I have 4 years Ubuntu experience.

=== Profile ===
You could always contact me with:
* Email: wanglei1123@gmail.com
* IRC: rawang on Freenode
* Launchpad ID: <nowiki>[[https://edge.launchpad.net/~raywang|raywang]]</nowiki>

=== Contributions ===
* Helps on Local Ubuntu community (Forums, IRC etc)
* Localization (I have done some of translations on LP, but most of them were committed to the upstream. GNOME etc)
* Spread Ubuntu (I'm in ubuntu-loco-enthusiast and ubuntu-l10n-zh-cn groups, so I was helping to push ubuntu usage and help them to solve problems.)

=== Future Plans ===
* I'd like to be more helpful for those who wants to try ubuntu, and give helps.
* To become a MOTU
* maintain <nowiki>[[http://www.mono-project.com/Accessibility|mono a11y]]</nowiki> packages both on my PPA and Ubuntu repository.
